channel.title: Need help with my 317, please reply
channel.description: need help with ym 317 spource, i want to change the ammount of items when you log in with a new account it gives wayyy 2 many runes ect, i was wondering how 2 change that? reply please

item.title: Need help with my 317, please reply
item.dc:creator: @Mark123Scape Mark123Scape
item.description:
@Mark123Scape wrote:

[quote=“Sp3ke, post:2, topic:296696”]Go to you’re client.java file and search for “starter”.

You should see something like this -

[code]
if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(386,1000);
addItem(995,5000000);
}

Just change where it says “addItem” to the amount you want. The first number is the item ID and the second number is the amount.

[/code][/quote] THANKS DUDE.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my 317, please reply

item.title: Need help with my 317, please reply
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Go to you’re client.java file and search for “starter”.

You should see something like this -

if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
   addSkillXP(14000000, 0); 
   addSkillXP(14000000, 2); 
   addSkillXP(14000000, 3); 
   addSkillXP(14000000, 4); 
   addSkillXP(14000000, 6); 
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(386,1000);
addItem(995,5000000);
}


Just change where it says "addItem" to the amount you want. The first number is the item ID and the second number is the amount.
